attributes.action: North Wales Police Chief Constable Resignation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I appeal to the good people of this country and the Prime Minister himself to do the honourable thing and sign this petition to remove the Chief Constable of North Wales Police.
This man is a liability to the Credit of our fine Police Authority!
He has reached new lows in showing pictures of people who, having been in a Road Traffic Collision have died, including one of a Decapitated Motorcyclist!! Without their Families Knowledge let alone Permision.
And this, all in the name of road safety! He continually destroys relations with the public, and the tourist industry alone is suffering desperately due to his Over Zealous use of Speed Camera Tactics.
Continually in the press for his actions and policies which are generally regarded as inapropriate, and ludicrous. 
For the victims of his indiscretion and tactless behavour I ask for this man to be removed from duty!
